Title: Relates to the payment of prevailing wage for work involving the delivery and hauling of aggregate supply construction materials in certain municipalities
Summary: Relates to the payment of prevailing wage for work in Nassau, Putnam, Suffolk and Westchester counties and in the city of New York involving the delivery and hauling of aggregate supply construction materials which shall include concrete and asphalt in addition to sand, gravel, stone, crushed stone, dirt, soil, millings, and fill.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to the payment of prevailing wage for work involving the delivery and hauling of aggregate supply construction materials
